alert.note: Alert for Chesapeake; Gloucester; Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; James City; Mathews; Newport News; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Suffolk; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:43AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with heavy rain will impact portions of northern Gates, northwestern Camden, north central Hertford, Isle of Wight, York, southeastern James City, southeastern Gloucester and southeastern Mathews Counties, the City of Poquoson, the western City of Norfolk, the western City of Chesapeake, the City of Hampton, the City of Newport News, the City of Portsmouth and the City of Suffolk through 645 AM EDT... At 541 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms centered along a line extending from Gloucester Point to near Como. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibility and minor flooding of poor drainage and low lying areas. Locations impacted include... Newport News, Hampton, Smithfield, Windsor, Langley AFB, Gloucester Point, Churchland, Sunbury, Virginia Institute For Marine Sciences, Hampton University, Old Dominion University, Christopher Newport University, Patrick Henry Field, Downtown Suffolk, Holland, Seaford, Deep Creek, Norfolk, Chesapeake and Portsmouth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Chesapeake; Gloucester; Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; James City; Mathews; Newport News; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Suffolk; York
